title: Rapper Logic’s Song About Suicide Prevention May Have Saved Hundreds of Lives, Study Says
sub_head: The song ‘1-800-273-8255’—the national suicide prevention hotline—and Logic’s ensuing performances led to higher call volume and decrease in suicides, research shows
body:
A song by the musician Logic named for the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline phone number might have saved hundreds of lives, according to a new study.
The 31-year-old rapper’s hit titled “1-800-273-8255” fueled the artist’s breakthrough on the music charts in 2017. He performed it at the MTV Video Music Awards four years ago and at the 60th Grammy Awards in 2018, where it was nominated for song of the year and best music video.
